verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
God has one Holy family.
God has one Holy family.
God has one Holy family.
And we are the members in particular.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
God has one royal priesthood...
God has one Holy manchild...
God has one Holy nation...
God has one first-fruit company...

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Dios tiene una familia santa.
Dios tiene una familia santa.
Dios tiene una familia santa,
y somos miembros cada uno
Dios tiene una tierra santa…
Dios tiene un cuerpo santo…
